conbody.p: Data Collectortroubleshootingtroubleshootingpipeline basicsUse the following tips for help with pipeline basics:

dlentry.dt: When I go to the console, I get a "Webpage not available" error message.
dlentry.dd: The is not running. Start the .

dlentry.dt: Why isn't the Start icon enabled?
dlentry.dd: You can start a pipeline when it is valid. Use the Issues icon to review the list of issues in your pipeline. When you resolve the issues, the Start icon becomes enabled.

dlentry.dt: Why doesn't the Select Fields with Preview Data option work? No preview data displays.
dlentry.dd: Select Fields with Preview Data works when the pipeline is valid for data preview. Make sure all stages are connected. You might also need to enter temporary values for required properties to enable data preview.

dlentry.dt: Sometimes I get a list of available fields and sometimes I don't. What's up with that?
dlentry.dd: The pipeline can display a list of available fields when the pipeline is valid for data preview. Make sure all stages are connected. You might also need to enter temporary values for required properties to enable data preview.

conbody.draft-comment: From Hari: Output data is not as expected [some fields are missing or have unexpected value or even type [expected integer but got string]].Trouble shoot by previewing and stepping through stages [data debugging :)].
